name: Rwenzori Mountains
description: Explore the majestic Rwenzori Mountains, known as the 'Mountains of the Moon.' Home to stunning glaciers, unique flora, and challenging trekking routes.

name: Bwindi Impenetrable Forest
description: Visit the home of the endangered mountain gorillas. A UNESCO World Heritage Site offering unforgettable gorilla trekking experiences.

name: Queen Elizabeth National Park
description: Experience diverse wildlife, including tree-climbing lions, elephants, and over 600 bird species in one of Uganda's most famous parks.
